Class Match

extends java.lang.Object
    Match Class This class manages the match
    Author:
    Federico Lichinchi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Match(java.util.List<Player> players)
      Match Class Builder It assigns an identifier code to the match, it creates a RoundTrack with 3 ToolCards and 3 PublicObjectiveCards casually chosen from the lists.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Match

        public Match(java.util.List<Player> players)
      throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Match Class Builder It assigns an identifier code to the match, it creates a RoundTrack with 3 ToolCards and 3 PublicObjectiveCards casually chosen from the lists. After that, it casually sets a PublicObjectiveCard for each player of the game. Before starting the first round, a number of Die are extracted from the Bag and put into Reserve. The Cards are imported from Json files situated in the resources folder. #ExtractedDice = 2 * #Players + 1
        Parameters:
        players - Array of players who join the match
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - if is not possible to clone a player
